radiographic_examinations.findings: Abdominal aortic aneurysm measuring up to 4.6 cm, gallbladder contains a calculus in the neck measuring approximately 6 mm, a tiny gallbladder polyp, no gallbladder wall edema or pericholecystic edema.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Abdominal aortic aneurysm size reduced from 5.2 cm to 4.6 cm; however, the difference in measurements is likely due to different techniques.
